unittitle_ssm: Brooklyn Academy of Photography Washington centennial photographs
abstract_ssm: The Brooklyn Academy of Photography Washington centennial photographs date from 1889 and contain 670 items. The collection includes photographs of Manhattan and Brooklyn taken by Brooklyn Academy of Photography members during the Washington centennial parade and related festivities.
corpname_ssm: Federal Hall National Memorial (New York, N.Y.)
